Class Downloader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      Downloader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Downloader
extends java.lang.Thread

Downloader class. Downloaders main goal is to download pieces of data from its assigned peer.

This is a multi-threaded class. In future when need to download from multiple peers in parallel it will be easy

Author:
Ted Nohh, Harshil Shah

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Downloaders run method
  • Performs handshake
  • Sends interested message
  • Waits for unchoke
  • Starts asking for pieces sequentially. Ideally should use BitSet and ask client which to download next. Left for Phase 2/3.
  • File downloaded!

run in interface java.lang.Runnable
